DCML.ShortDescription: This file is for storing printing options for EDA Designs.

Object.Name: EzPrint.Output
Object.ShortDescription: This Printing Config Object is for General Output Printing Settings

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.Margins
Parameter.ShortDescription: This Sets the Margins of the Paper

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.Paper
Parameter.ShortDescription: This Sets the size of the Paper

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.PaperMedia
Parameter.ShortDescription: This selects the Media for Paper

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.Autofit
Parameter.ShortDescription: This is for Automatic fitting the contents in the output file

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.AutoRotate
Parameter.ShortDescription: This is for rotation of contents while automatic fitting them in the output file

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.UseSourcePageSize
Parameter.ShortDescription: This is for using the source document page sizes for printing

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.GenerateMultipleFiles
Parameter.ShortDescription: If multiple input documents are given, this can be used to generate multiple output files for each input document

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.Scaling
Parameter.ShortDescription: This is for Scaling of the contents in the output file

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.Orientation
Parameter.ShortDescription: This Sets the Orientation (Portrait/Landscape/Landscape and Rotated) of the Paper

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Output.OutputPaper.ColorPrinting
Parameter.ShortDescription: This can be Color/Gray Scale/Black and White

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Header.Enable
Parameter.ShortDescription: Enable header generation in output

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Header.Left
Parameter.ShortDescription: Left header field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Header.Center
Parameter.ShortDescription: Center header field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Header.Right
Parameter.ShortDescription: Right header field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Header.Size
Parameter.ShortDescription: Size of header field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Header.SizeUnit
Parameter.ShortDescription: Size unit of header field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Header.CustomText
Parameter.ShortDescription: Custom header text

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Footer.Enable
Parameter.ShortDescription: Enable footer generation in output

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Footer.Left
Parameter.ShortDescription: Left footer field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Footer.Center
Parameter.ShortDescription: Center footer field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Footer.Right
Parameter.ShortDescription: Right footer field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Footer.Size
Parameter.ShortDescription: Size of footer field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Footer.SizeUnit
Parameter.ShortDescription: Size unit of footer field

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Footer.CustomText
Parameter.ShortDescription: Custom footer text

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Document.DateFormat
Parameter.ShortDescription: Date format

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Document.StartPageNumber
Parameter.ShortDescription: Start page numbering at

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.DocumentManager.Document.CompanyName
Parameter.ShortDescription: Company name

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Action.Process.Job
Parameter.ShortDescription: This printing configuration for selecting Job type export/print

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Action.Process.Format
Parameter.ShortDescription: This printing configuration for selecting the PDF/PS2/PS3/HPGL2/svg format of the Jobtype export/print

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Action.InputOutput.ExportToPDFFilePath
Parameter.ShortDescription: PDF Output will be saved at this location

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Action.InputOutput.ExportToPostScript3FilePath
Parameter.ShortDescription: Postscript3 Output will be saved at this location

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Action.InputOutput.ExportToHPGL2FilePath
Parameter.ShortDescription: HPGL2 Output will be saved at this location

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Action.InputOutput.ExportToPostScript2FilePath
Parameter.ShortDescription: Postscript2 Output will be saved at this location

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Transformations.MaintainAspectRatio
Parameter.ShortDescription: This is for maintaining AspectRatio of the contents in the output file

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Transformations.OpacityMode
Parameter.ShortDescription: To outline geoms as lines and emulate opaque areas

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Brush.BackgroundColor
Parameter.ShortDescription: Background Color

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Brush.ForegroundColor
Parameter.ShortDescription: Foreground Color

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Brush.Economode
Parameter.ShortDescription: This can be Color/Gray Scale/Black and White

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Pen.ScalePenWidth
Parameter.ShortDescription: It will scale up/down the pen width. Expressed in percentage i.e. 100 means no scaling.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Pen.ScaleZeroPenWidth
Parameter.ShortDescription: Enable if zero pen width should be scaled as one pen width.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Pen.ScaleOnePenWidth
Parameter.ShortDescription: Enable if One pen width should be scaled as one pen width.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Colormap.List
Parameter.ShortDescription: list of color map

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Colormap.ListIndex
Parameter.ShortDescription: index of currently used colormap

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.Colormap.EnableColormap
Parameter.ShortDescription: Enable Colormap

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.FalconStrokeFonts.ReplaceTtfForStroke
Parameter.ShortDescription: Use true type replacement for stroke fonts

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.FalconStrokeFonts.StrokeFont
Parameter.ShortDescription: Stroke Font File

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.FalconStrokeFonts.ReplaceTtfForMgcStroke
Parameter.ShortDescription: true type font replacement for mgc v1 stroke fonts

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Graphics.FalconStrokeFonts.MgcStrokeFont
Parameter.ShortDescription: MGC Stroke Font File

ParameterGroup.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput
ParameterGroup.ScreenName: PDFOutput <!-- There is no group, only one parameter exists-->

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.PDFA1b
Parameter.ShortDescription: Allows generated PDF to be of PDF/A-1b standard compliant.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.EmbedFonts
Parameter.ShortDescription: Allows embedding of fonts in generated PDF file. If disabled,fonts cannot be embedded in generated PDF file.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.EnableLayers
Parameter.ShortDescription: Extended Print can generate PDF output with or without layers. When layers are enabled, each page in generated PDF will have layer wise graphical data which can be selected to view in a PDF viewer. When layers are disabled, generated PDF will not have any layer and every graphical entity will be rendered on a page.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.Mirror
Parameter.ShortDescription: Extended Print can generate PDF output with mirrored graphics. When mirror is enabled, each page in generated PDF will have graphical data mirrored with respect to vertical axis. When mirror is disabled, generated PDF will not have any mirroring of graphical entity will be rendered on a page.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.TextSelection
Parameter.ShortDescription: TextSelection

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.DocumentEditing
Parameter.ShortDescription: DocumentEditing

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.EnablePrinting
Parameter.ShortDescription: EnablePrinting

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.InvokeViewer
Parameter.ShortDescription: On Setting this, PDF output will be viewed in viewer

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.ExportToPDF.PDFOutput.Transparency
Parameter.ShortDescription: On Setting this, PDF Output will be transparent as per set value

Object.Name: EzPrint.Print
Object.ShortDescription: For Printing graphics data to a printer in Postscript Format

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Print.Options.ManualFeed
Parameter.ShortDescription: Selecting this option will prompt user to manually feed the paper into printer

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Print.Options.UseForms
Parameter.ShortDescription: Extended Print can generate postscript output with or without forms. When forms are enabled, file size on disk and spooling time will be less but it requires good amount of memory on printer or plotter. When forms are disabled, file size on disk and spooling time will be more but it requires small memory on printer or plotter.

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Print.Options.DuplexPrinting
Parameter.ShortDescription: User can control duplex printing option by selecting one of the following values: Disabled/Flipped on Horizontal side/Flipped on Vertical Side

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Print.Options.SelectTray
Parameter.ShortDescription: User can Specify the Output Tray from Automatic/Tray1/Tray2/Tray3/Tray4/Tray5/Tray0

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.Print.Options.NumberOfCopies
Parameter.ShortDescription: User can give number of copies of the output document

Object.Name: EzPrint.SystemSettings
Object.ShortDescription: For retrieving information about various files required to run the application

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.SystemSettings.SpoolCommands.Platform
Parameter.ShortDescription: You can choose the platfrom to view spooling command for

Parameter.Name: EzPrint.SystemSettings.SpoolCommands.Windows
Parameter.ShortDescription: Command to spool files to print on Windows platform
